alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Fremont County Including Canon City, Howard, Texas Creek; Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Pueblo County Including Pueblo; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 11 at 3:13PM MST until December 12 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued from 10 AM through 5 PM Sunday for gusty winds and low relative humidity for fire weather zones 222, 228, 229, 230, 233, and 237 which includes Fremont, Pueblo, Huerfano, Las Animas, and Baca counties... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 222...228...229... 230...233 AND 237... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 10 AM to 5 PM MST Sunday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 222...228...229...230... 233 and 237. * Winds...West 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 6 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Fremont County Including Canon City, Howard, Texas Creek; Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Pueblo County Including Pueblo; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher
